website_summaries.verdict: This low-cost neck brace has shorter walls than some other choices. Consider it if you are petite and/or have a shorter neck.
pros: May be more appropriate for nighttime wear thanks to its  smaller dimensions
Breathable outer layer is comfortable and cool
cons: May be too narrow for larger users

customer_reviews.title: Save your neck muscles!
customer_reviews.text: It's not just for whiplash. The collar actually supports your head which takes the weight off of your neck and shoulders. I learned from a physician these are invaluable for anyone, regardless of age. If you're at the computer a lot, Christmas baking, house cleaning - you will be surprised how much this collar saves you from getting aching muscles in your neck. At night, you can wear it to sleep. It may sound uncomfortable, but flip it around and wear it backwards with the smaller piece in the front and bigger in back. You'll never wake up with a stiff neck again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashland

customer_reviews.title: Measure neck before buying
customer_reviews.text: Size small was way too large for my small neck. Check your exact neck measurements with product measurements before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Good product with a few qualifications
customer_reviews.text: Like many other people I struggled to get the right size and it took me three rounds. However, it was worth it, I wish I could’ve tried it on first but it’s not a very expensive item This is a very comfortable collar for daytime use.and it is giving me a considerable pain relief I wouldn’t recommend sleeping in it but I don’t think that’s what it’s for. Also great for airplanes - much better than the standard neck rest sold for flying. I do agree that the fabric is itchy. I might’ve given it four stars for this but I thought there were a lot of unfair one star reviews. I do hope they find a better cover material
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: I have sever arthritis in my neck and was told ...
customer_reviews.text: I have sever arthritis in my neck and was told by my physical therapist not to look up, not to garden and not to vacuum. Well, I do need to vacuum, at lest once in a while. A friend said that she cleans house wearing a cervical collar, so I thought I would try it. And, it works so well that I not only vacuum I have gone back to doing Pilates(another thing I could no longer do). Now my house is cleaner and my stomach is flatter! The collar keeps me from looking up so I no longer get a head ache from looking up, vacuuming etc.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Salyer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic neck collar
customer_reviews.text: I just had neck surgery and the collar the hospital gave me nearly suffocated me! I tried various collars on at the local drug store, but none felt good. So... I looked around on Amazon and found this collar. After reading the reviews I decided to order it and could hafdy wait for it to be delivered. The collar feels so wonderful on my poor, sore neck. It has plenty of velco to keep it fastened nice and snug. And, it even came with it's own cover to help keep it clean.
customer_reviews.author: SanAntonoDiva

customer_reviews.title: Came without a sock to cover it and others always ...
customer_reviews.text: Came without a sock to cover it and others always come with the sock liner. I don't see any difference between my 3inch collar and this supposedly 2.5 collar. Wish I didn't order it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.text: unused as of 5/20. Purchaser hypothesizes need of product since residing and moving from previous apt#4. 1.111, item paid with credit card, credit card paid in full, 2.111 use of item stalked with persons staring at phones, calculating use of benefits?, 3.111, i. Private employment pursued, and Private housing change researched politely for 3 years, yet unsuccessful. ii.ix. Crowds of masked persons, noises and sensations near hallway cleaning closet and stairs to cleaning storage, outside of apt 301?, iii. hendered cleaining, organizing, restroom use, resting, and typing, ? until crowds of...halve a CEO resume?.
customer_reviews.author: James Edward Curtis Jr

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Great collar. It is 1-1/2 inches larger than my neck but the end is narrower and I easily tightened it to fit securely and provide support. It also came with a cover so you can remove it and wash it when needed. The best thing about it was PrimeNow. I am injured and unable to drive. The doctor prescribed a collar but didn't stock them. PrimeNow got it to me the same day I ordered it. Love PrimeNow.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are incorrect
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I’m having surgery next week and I was provided a cervical collar by the hospital but I wanted an extra one. They said it would fit a 15 1/2 inch neck and it does not. It was way too small. Now I have to pay postage to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Groves

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is Way Off
customer_reviews.text: I measured my next exactly as specified. According to the instructions, I was right in the middle of the range for a medium, which didn't make sense because I've always worn a large shirt. But I figured the manufacturer knew their product. What a mistake. I clearly needed a large, and not a medium. Big waste of time. I then ordered a "Velpeau Neck Brace -Foam Cervical Collar and it feels way better. It's a few dollars more, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Light small neck support
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this brace to keep my daughters head up while taking horseback riding lessons. It is not as tall or as thick/supportive as others I've seen but for my purposes it is perfect. If you are looking for thinner lighter support then this is fine. If you need full support DO NOT order this product.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to get the right size
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd gotten a size large. This is a medium. Other than that its nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Roude

customer_reviews.title: Meets my needs!
customer_reviews.text: I went with this collar over Amazon's many other choices because I'm a small person and this product comes in X-Small. There's also a choice of neck depths, which few other manufacturers offered. The "sock" covering is a little scratchy but bearable, especially at this price. The unit works as a gentle support. Folks who need their necks almost immobilized will not find this product firm enough.
customer_reviews.author: CDW

customer_reviews.title: Not for a short-necked person
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my wife. She has a very short neck. Size information of this product is inadequate to judge how it would fit her. It's too high under her chin for her to comfortably use it. Can't be returned. So it went into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Marc O'Polo

customer_reviews.title: Tab fastener is too short
customer_reviews.text: The tab fastener is short making it difficult to fasten. If I tried to make the brace a bit looser it came undone. It is uncomfortable when laying on my back in bed because there is a lump where the two ends meet.
customer_reviews.author: SeniorShopper

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality and fit of the item. I am using the product to help with my posture since at my age head being down is common. I am always shy of awarding 5 stars in the beginning of a product due to the durability aspect of the item. The chart to indicate proper fit was helpful for me.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN M SULLIVAN

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is itchy
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 3.5" collar. In places it is 4", which is too big for me. The worst thing is that even though it is covered in a ribbed fabric, the fabric is itchy!! I couldn't stand to wear it. I had to put another wrapper on it, which further added to the bulk. I quit using it.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaM

customer_reviews.title: Great product, helps support to lower neck pain and stiffness.
customer_reviews.text: Great product quality and customer experience! Not big and bulky size , fits great to help neck and head as I work on the computer at home and it definitely helps with support and to minimize stiff neck!
customer_reviews.author: Pauliny Cicero

customer_reviews.title: WORKS
customer_reviews.text: MORE COMFORTABLE THAN MY OCCUPATIONAL SUBLUXATION/CERVICAL DETERIORATION. I WEAR IT WHEN I HAVE TO BE IN WHEELCHAIR FOR 1/2 DAY OR MORE, OTHERWISE I SIT FOR 1-2 HRS AT HOME AND REST MY NECK WITH A CERVICAL SUPPORT PILLOW WHILE LAYING DOWN FOR 1/2 HR OR SO.
customer_reviews.author: Maui Doug

customer_reviews.title: Doctor recommended to prevent headaches and neck stress
customer_reviews.text: Doctor recommended I get this to sleep In for the bad disc and slurs in my neck and to also wear later in the afternoon when I get fatigued to prevent headaches. It really has seemed to help with my headache problem and improve my quality of sleep. Haven’t woken up with as many headaches or stiff neck pain since starting to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: Comfort And Relief.
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box I put this on and WOW !!! What a difference, I have a very stiff neck with a lot of pain and it helps better than roll stuff from a bottle. This helped ease the pain more than I could have imagined plus we tried the one my wife has on my knee and it helps . We differently are ordering another one for my knee.
customer_reviews.author: STEVE HAYES

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I use this collar For pain in my neck. It provides some relief by not letting me tilt my head down too far while using my iPad. It is comfortable, reasonably priced and easy to put on and take off and I am Pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Florence E. Fessler

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this...
customer_reviews.text: The velcro tab that you pull to take it off is about a 1/2 inch long. It's gonna be a total pain to get that thing off and on. I have long hair and when I tried it on, I couldn't find the tab to get pull to get it off. The velcro is longer than that, but it's IN the collar so it's not functionally as long as it's listed as... If I could leave my house, I would return it. Bad design.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: These collars have good support without being too stiff.
customer_reviews.text: I have had my neck fused twice which consisted of six of the seven vertebrae being fused. I have worn this type of collar many times and since the top vertebra is now deteriorating and could only be fused to my skull and my head would no longer move, I am wearing collars again. The collars I have purchased from here are comfortable and help ease the pain in my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann

customer_reviews.title: Sleep with this!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has severe arthritis and disk problems in his neck. He wears this at night to stabilize his neck and no longer wakes up with severe pain. This $10 item has done what doctors, drugs and therapy could not do.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Better than nothing.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work as well as the one the doctor gave me, but is sufficient for short time usage. It gets uncomfortable and hot after a half hour or so. Could be just me. I recommend it for a substitute for short term useage. The price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Old Timer

customer_reviews.title: Obviously Used
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived dirty an in an open package. There is hair all over it, disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: tunam3lt

customer_reviews.title: Soft but very supportive
customer_reviews.text: I used it when I was having vertigo and the stability helped with dizziness. Even now whenever I get some neck pain, I use it for a few hours and pain just vanishes. Its soft but very supportive.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: SIZE DESCRIPTION INACCURATE
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars only because the size description is inaccurate. The item seems of good quality. I would probably opt for the next size up if you're considering this.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Needed a narrow one as I've head neck surgery and my neck is not as long as it was. Surgery was several years ago and I need to use a brace again sometimes. This fits perfectly and allows me to rest my neck comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: ButtonsTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Good support
customer_reviews.text: The cervical collar provides good support for my neck. However, the Velcro strapping isn't holding as well as it did when I bought it a few months ago.
customer_reviews.author: RTH in IA

customer_reviews.title: perfect amount of firm
customer_reviews.text: was worried about it being soft foam(i'm used to soft foam going bad once it warms from body heat) but it has the perfect amount of firmness to be supportive but not super squishy
customer_reviews.author: Drago Black

customer_reviews.title: Defective product or design
customer_reviews.text: The item I bought hardly had a Velcro strap for tightening the collar, compared to the longer collar which had a strap of the correct length. So the smaller collar I ordered was not usable. Actually, it should receive 0 ⭐️ s...
customer_reviews.author: Lynna Marie Y SyCip

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My wife recently had disc replacement surgery on her neck and this product was very useful. The size was great, very comfortable not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: F. BRIGGS

customer_reviews.title: Not just for winning court cases!
customer_reviews.text: I have had neck issues for years. I'm not a doctor, but wearing this to bed has greatly improved the pain and discomfort I was experiencing.
customer_reviews.author: Elle B.

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Very well fitted for someone with a short neck. Easy to put on, also keeps one’s neck warm in winter weather.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Civil court or civil liberty
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to my upstairs neighbor for impactfully and continuously dropping a bowling ball over my head upon settling into my comfort in my apartment-- causing my spine to injury and providing medical expense from their rental insurance to cover my injuries...
customer_reviews.author: Conya Holness

customer_reviews.title: Helps a lot.
customer_reviews.text: The Medium size worked well for me - 6' male of slim build. Comfortable for wearing while sleeping or sitting up reading.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna

customer_reviews.title: No no no
customer_reviews.text: No way you can sleep with this thing. I ordered new one, repackaged one arrived with hairs on it.
customer_reviews.author: blue

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable at all. You get what you pay for. Did not help with my neck. Didn’t help holding my neck up, and didn’t help with resting on it
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: It helps to reduce leaks.
customer_reviews.text: It helps keeping my chin from tucking into my chest & improves control of my sleep apnea.
customer_reviews.author: Cairnz

customer_reviews.title: Stiff Neck No More
customer_reviews.text: Helped me through a stiff neck week. Able to sleep with it also. Solid product, and good value.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Georgia

customer_reviews.title: cervical neck brace
customer_reviews.text: it's a little narrower than the one I received from my doctor but it works great
customer_reviews.author: Lawana grimsley

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I needed and works fine. A little bit of pressure under my chin but aside from that it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer_0001

customer_reviews.title: Great neck support
customer_reviews.text: Really helpful to use while sleeping. Best sleep I have had in months
customer_reviews.author: Hugh

customer_reviews.title: It was okay didn't come with a sleeve.
customer_reviews.text: It was okay didn't come with a sleeve. It helps for awhile then I have to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Feld

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping when needed
customer_reviews.text: This is just as I hoped, not too large or overly thick. dementia family member starting to droop forward. This really helps to keep them facing up.
customer_reviews.author: acornone

customer_reviews.title: Supports my head
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well. Velcro closure is strong and works well. Supports my head.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanna

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It was fine for the short time it was needed. Would have liked an extra sleeve to keep it fresh between washings.
customer_reviews.author: Hulagramma from Oxnard

customer_reviews.title: Just fine
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife. Fits better than her old one.
customer_reviews.author: "thesheriff"

customer_reviews.title: neck pain
customer_reviews.text: Was sleeping with cervical pillow, but would awaken with neck pain. Went to get deep tissue massage, taking NSAID & muscle relaxant, & saw chiropractor, but was still waking up with severe neck pain. This fixed it :)!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my neck.  Not too wide, and is really comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for giving my neck some relief from the weight of my head! I had a double cervical fusion 28 years ago, and the cervical collar helps give my neck some respite. This is the second one I have ordered, so I have a spare when I've "sweated up" the first one and need to launder it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on dog!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dog to stop chewing on himself instead of using a cone of shame. Worked great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce E. Cheney

customer_reviews.title: A neighbor who I don't know received my order
customer_reviews.text: Some neighbor who I don't know and I don't know where they live received my order of my neck brace and I have a whiplash from a car accident back in September of last year and I I want my neck brace and I shouldn't have to pay for it again and I have to make sure the rest of my orders don't go to someone else home, Karla Hodge
customer_reviews.author: Karla Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Price and product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and price. A little to narrow should have gotten the 3 inch. My bad
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item since my job wouldn’t give me the day off. This neck brace gave me the injured look I needed to make my boss and co workers feel bad. I was able to get away with doing the bare minimum! The brace was very comfortable and provided great support.
customer_reviews.author: Josh W.

customer_reviews.title: Good neck support
customer_reviews.text: I use it when I garden or wash my car where I am bending over for a length of time. If I don’t I get a neck strain, just don’t have muscles like I used to when younger.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about them. Very breathable and comfortable !
customer_reviews.author: R. MCCARTER

customer_reviews.title: No smell, great support and well made.
customer_reviews.text: No smell, great support when I need it for computer cramp and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Mom who has alot of neck pain. She loves it and says it helps relieve her neck pain. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, not useful for sleeping, feels too large
customer_reviews.text: The collar feels uncomfortable. It feels too large even though the manufacturer recommends a medium size for 15.5" - 17.5" neck size (mine is 17"). The collar also seems to exacerbate my neck pain rather than provide any relief so it is not useful for sleeping, contrary to what the description states.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I had cancer 35 years ago and still have trouble with my neck, this collar is comfortable and helps ease the pain I go through daily.
customer_reviews.author: lou

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I have degenerative disc and just sleeping in this helps tons. Thank you Dr. Karl Freydl for suggesting this. It's helping
customer_reviews.author: Susan Roberge

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This collar is as good as anything Ive gotten from medical supplies and less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: J. Keenan

customer_reviews.title: Waaaaay too small to fit a regular man's neck.....
customer_reviews.text: The product is useless. It is way too small. I am a regular size man. Probably would work well for petite woman.....and petite men.
customer_reviews.author: majic

customer_reviews.title: SIZE CHART IS USELESS
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the proper size, according to the chart and actual measurements. Much too small.
customer_reviews.author: nikola86

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Was too big. When trying to return item, was given a run around with a not so smooth process.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Lighting fast shipping!! Item arrived exactly as described. Recommended seller 100%+++++++
customer_reviews.author: D.L.

customer_reviews.title: I had c3 remove so I sleep with a brace ...
customer_reviews.text: I had c3 remove so I sleep with a brace on. Helps to support the neck, so this works great
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: good support
customer_reviews.text: Not hook and loop. Just short velcro strap. Works, though. Have to add more velcro to work properly. And a little too stiff
customer_reviews.author: Gilah Friedberg

customer_reviews.title: Please avoid it unless you have want your neck in knots!
customer_reviews.text: Product is totally not worth it. My neck was hurting after using it a couple of nights. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mohan Irvathraya

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for chin falling issues
customer_reviews.text: It didn't really support my neck but I was having issues keeping my head from falling towards my back. If you were having issues with your chin falling down in front it would likely be very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: counselowe

customer_reviews.title: To keep my mouth shut
customer_reviews.text: I use it to keep my mouth shut when I sleep To prevent dry mouth and also biting my tung , lips and my cheek I wish it was only two inch’s instead of 2.5 and softer
customer_reviews.author: Othman baban

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me. Sorry
customer_reviews.text: I could not sleep with it no matter how many times I tried. That was the plan, it just didn't work. After a week I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Krow

customer_reviews.title: Helps with pulled neck muscles!
customer_reviews.text: Good product. A little aggravating to sleep with at first, but does help to stabilize neck.
customer_reviews.author: GracieRose

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with small frame
customer_reviews.text: The collar was soft, comfortable and gave my neck relief from cervical pain. I liked the small height choice so I don't feel like I am choking. I only have 3 inches within the shoulder and head. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this hard to find item in our community. Also, other collars I have had had irritating collar closures, but this collar is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product....I have a small head and neck and this size is perfect for me.....the larger cervical collars were much too large for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Why I buy AMAZON. Fastest Delivery, quality products from value vendors. 5 Stars ALL DAY every Day.
customer_reviews.text: Incredible Relief. I wear it of and on all day. Really helps if your doing Computer work and you have prior or current injury. Like the commonly referred to "Whiplash" or cracked Cervical Discs healing. Works better than medications sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: jojoRod

customer_reviews.title: ... than anything I could find in stores and works great. I keep it in the car and will ...
customer_reviews.text: Less expensive than anything I could find in stores and works great. I keep it in the car and will wear it while driving or going to the gym. I have a different one that I keep at home. I don't wear one all the time - just to give me a boost and reduce strain.
customer_reviews.author: BarbS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Got it for my stepdad who was in a horrible car accident. He said it was comfortable and easy to wash in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, didn't ha ve an is sue with it. You might be able to find a set for a little cheaper, but save yourself the hassle and just buy this.
customer_reviews.author: rita leite

customer_reviews.title: It does at a minimum, what it needs to do.
customer_reviews.text: It gives some cervical support. I'd imagine if I'd wear it correctly, it might be more effective. To that end, I wear it the opposite way, because it seemed to work better.
customer_reviews.author: Gina M. Dobson

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This has a very stiff foam and was what I needed. They offer a wonderful sizing chart too!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. It’s helped me so much!!! Neck and shoulder pain gone

customer_reviews.text: Product seem OK similar to most out there, however, buyer beware, it is not true to size and they find ways not to replace or return by making you pay for the return.

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend wearing it when driving because it does restrict your ...
customer_reviews.text: This collar works very well. I don't recommend wearing it when driving because it does restrict your movement if you have to turn your head..

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, and was the perfect size. This brace is more comfortable than others I've tried.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It is comforting to wear when my neck is giving me fits.
customer_reviews.author: RPL

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not all necks are created the same so I appreciate having a smaller cervical collar.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Lou

customer_reviews.title: Used it often
customer_reviews.text: Comfort and easy to use. Able to sleep with it on.
customer_reviews.author: John Druzsba

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with a short neck.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a short neck you will love these.
customer_reviews.author: a customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend to anyone with cervical pain !
customer_reviews.text: Just received yesterday, been wearing all day today: and could tell: that is exactly what I needed. I have severe cervical arthritis, and I'm constantly in pain, even though I take some medications. My job also requires- to sit all day and work with computer and documents. I went trough 3 epidurals, and it did not help me at all ! IM also doing laser treatments, that gives me some relive, but still in pain. My ortho doctor recommended neck cervical support. I was kinda skeptical at first, and now realized- it does help ! Super fast shipping ! Collar itself made of very comfortable and breathable fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Lovely Lady

customer_reviews.title: Increases Stability of the Cervical Spine
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It stabilized my neck after chiropractic adjustments so that they "held" better...resulting in less pain.
customer_reviews.author: MaryKay Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears it a few hours a day. The size makes it comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Little

customer_reviews.title: Runs really small even for X-small
customer_reviews.text: They could have increased the length another inch or two.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and keeps my neck stable while driving or riding in the car.
customer_reviews.author: TexasGirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, fairly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A bit too high for me (5 ft 4 in woman), but some adjustments made it fairly comfortable. Easy to put on and take off. Great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: mcerner

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: After a car accident, I need extra support especially when driving long distances. This does it just fine so I arrive without more neck pain. Yeah, it looks dorky. But that reduced pain offsets the dorkiness!
customer_reviews.author: ShootNShopGirl

product_meta.title: OTC Cervical Collar, Soft Foam, Neck Support Brace, Medium (Narrow 2.5" Depth Collar)
product_meta.description: Color:Narrow 2.5" Depth Collar| Size:Medium (Pack of 1)OTC Cervical Collar, Soft Foam, Neck Support Brace, Medium (Narrow 2.5" Depth Collar)
feature_bullets: Provides limited cervical motion control, and is recommended wherever a reminder against making quick and painful neck movements is required. The anatomically contoured shape comfortably fits the contours of the chin and jaw. Especially convenient for wear while sleeping.

Soft polyfoam padding closely conforms for a custom fit. The lightweight stockinette covering is breathable and keeps the neck area cool for long term wearing comfort. Hook and pile closure in back for quick and easy fit.
Measure neck circumference for size, for front depth, take a straight line measurement from sternal notch to base of mandible.
Available in Narrow (2.5 Inches), Average (3.0 Inches), and Wide (3.5 Inches) front depths.
Size options: X-Small (11.5-13.5 inch), Small (13.5-15.5 inch), Medium (15.5-17.5 inch), Large (17.5-19.5 inch), X-Large (19.5-21.5 inch), Universal (13.5-19.5 inch).

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
